properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "msmpeng.exe" and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "pssuspend.exe" or (FolderPath endswith "\\pssuspend.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\pssuspend64.exe"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects suspicious execution of Sysinternals PsSuspend, where the utility is used to suspend critical processes such as AV or EDR to bypass defenses
